sentences.en: a bulletin on the President's health
sentences.cn: 关于总统健康状况的公告

sentences.en: At 3:30 p.m. a bulletin was released announcing that the president was out of immediate danger.
sentences.cn: 下午3:30发布了公告，宣布总统暂时脱离了危险。

sentences.en: At 3.30 p.m. a bulletin was released announcing that the president  was out of immediate danger.
sentences.cn: 下午3点30分发布了公告，称总统已经暂时脱离危险。

sentences.en: At 3.30 p.m. a bulletin was released announcing that the president was out of immediate danger.
sentences.cn: 下午3点30分发布了公告，称总统已经暂时脱离危险。

sentences.en: Bulletin boards charted each executive's progress.
sentences.cn: 公告牌显示了每个主管人员的工作进展情况。

sentences.en: Here is the latest bulletin about the President's health.
sentences.cn: 这是总统健康情况的最新报告.

sentences.en: Look, this is our company's quarterly bulletin.
sentences.cn: 看, 这就是我们公司出版的季刊.

sentences.en: She has posted photographs on bulletin boards.
sentences.cn: 她已把照片贴在了公告牌上。

sentences.en: She waited tensely for the next bulletin.
sentences.cn: 她焦虑地等候着下一期公告。

sentences.en: The benefit to the donor was an acknowledgment of the donation in a printed bulletin.
sentences.cn: 捐赠者被印入捐赠公示榜以示感谢。

sentences.en: The Internet is the largest computer bulletin board in the world.
sentences.cn: 因特网是世界上最大的计算机公告系统。

sentences.en: The radio bulletin warned of the typhoon.
sentences.cn: 收音机新闻快报发布了台风警报。

sentences.en: The students put up a poster on the bulletin board.
sentences.cn: 学生们在布告牌上贴了一张海报.

sentences.en: Try browsing around in the network bulletin boards.
sentences.cn: 试着在网络论坛上浏览信息。

sentences.en: We'll be going live to Nottingham later in this bulletin.
sentences.cn: 在本次新闻快报中,我们稍后将有来自诺丁汉的现场报道.

trans.tran_en: an official statement that tells people about something important
